description:
Stiff and with an extra layer of toe protection, the Freerider Pro is grippy with excellent power transfer for all-mountain riding. The Primeblue edition is created from recycled plastic bottles removed from our world's oceans, so you can be psyched about throwing that sick whip, and about your contribution to the environment.Created with yarn spun from plastic waste recovered from beaches and coastal communities, in partnership with Parley For The Oceans™.Poron foam lining in toe box adds impact protection.EVA midsole for added shock absorption.Mid-flex midsole for efficient pedaling.Stealth® S1™ rubber outsole sticks like glue even in cold weather.Classic Dotty™ tread stays clean.

        Sustainability














                      Recycled content
name: Five Ten Freerider Pro Primeblue Cycling Shoes - Unisex
